: ninneyokke pidichu policil elpikkan ariyanjittalla. ninakkokke valiya pidipad alle ooriporum pinnem mmade mekkitt kerum)
: ath kond aadhyam nee paranja kali .ninte oru padhathiyum nadakkilla  ath ninte appan mathayide  parambin vendeettalla aa pavam josephettan urangunna mann aanath athin vendi njangal kalikkum)
nee nerathe paranjallo ivan jayicha parambu ezhuthi kodukkaann  nee aa kali thiricha vecho  nee mathayikk thanne undaayathaanel aa conditionil mmakk oru kali ang kalikkam)
: njan paranja paranjath thanne. iniyippo ithoru vaashiyaya sthithik njan konduvanna piller undaavilla)
